name: DRAGONFACTS
0:
”Alexa, open dragon facts”
”Alexa, launch dragon facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dragon facts
des:
Ask for dragon Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

drago Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch dragon Facts" or "Alexa, open dragon Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
